content: Hello, Jordan. Tell me a little bit about artificial intelligence and its uses.

Hey there! Artificial intelligence, or AI, is a pretty fascinating field. It's all about developing computer systems that can perform tasks that usually require human intelligence. One example everyone knows is chatbots like me, but AI goes way beyond just small talk!

AI is used in a bunch of different industries. In healthcare, it helps with disease diagnosis and drug development. In finance, it helps analyze complex data and make predictions. And in transportation, it's being used to develop self-driving cars. Basically, AI is that friend who's really good at crunching numbers and finding patterns, but doesn't need a bathroom break!

So, whether you realize it or not, AI is practically everywhere these days, and it's only going to keep getting smarter. They're taking over the world, one algorithm at a time! 🤖💪
